attributes.action: Give Nigel Farage a knighthood and peerage.
attributes.additional_details: Without his singular leadership, more than 17 million voters, the largest popular vote in the history of Parliament, would not have had their democratic will carried out. it's time for the "establishment" to acknowledge that they and their predecessors GOT IT WRONG about Brexit and for the will of the people not to just be acted upon but embraced.
attributes.background: Acknowledge the tireless efforts of Nigel Farage, which resulted in the United Kingdom leaving the European Union, with a peerage - for the duration of the life of fhe House of Lords - and a knighthood.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions about honours or appointments, including requests for individuals to receive knighthoods or be appointed to the House of Lords.

The Government will only accept individual nominations. To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
